scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:ts && npm run build:ts:api
scripts.watch: npm run watch:css & npm run watch:ts
scripts.dev: npm run build:ts:api && concurrently "npm run watch" "npm run watch:ts:api" "npm run serve:api" "npm run serve"
scripts.dev:api: npm run build:ts:api && npm run serve:api
scripts.dev:all: npm run build:ts:api && concurrently "npm run watch" "npm run watch:ts:api" "npm run serve:api" "npm run serve"
scripts.start: npm run build && concurrently "npm run serve:api" "npm run serve"
scripts.start:api: npm run build:ts:api && npm run serve:api
scripts.start:all: npm run build && concurrently "npm run serve:api" "npm run serve"
